tier.item: (2) a. (dat) Aad Jantje de lerares de knikkers liet helpen opruimen
that Aad Jantje the teacher the marbles let help collect

(3) a. A. Single embedding, no intervening adverb:
Siitaa-ne Hari-ko [kitaab-ko khariid-neko] kahaa
Sita-erg Hari-dat book-acc buy-inf t ol d
`Sita told Hari to buy the book.'
